name: Pledge of Love
storyline:
Your hard work has paid off—you’ve landed a full-ride to the prestigious Elwood University! However, your scholarship requires you to join a Greek organization, and you missed rush week! Luckily, Omega Kappa is still accepting new pledges, but there’s just one problem… they only accept boys!

Determined to stay at the school of your dreams, you disguise yourself as a boy and get accepted instantly. Soon you discover the true reason why they accept pledges year round—the fraternity is on its last legs... These handsome frat brothers need your help to turn things around, but can you keep your true identity hidden long enough to help revive the fraternity? Can you balance schoolwork, romance, and wild parties in a house full of testosterone?
summary: You missed sorority rush week, but don’t worry — there’s still an opening… at an all-boys fraternity! But can you be convincing as one of the boys…?
